definition: a starter, as on a motorcycle, that is activated with the foot and the weight of the body, to use a kick starter to start an engine
details:
noun
- a starter, as on a motorcycle, that is activated with the foot and the weight of the body
= example: a starter, as on a motorcycle, that is activated with the foot and the weight of the body
= synonyms: kick starter
verb
- to use a kick starter to start an engine
= example: to use a kick starter to start an engine
